TABLE.NAME: reengagement
TABLE.COMMENT: Details about instances of the reengagement activity

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: Course reengagement activity belongs to

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name field for moodle instances

FIELD.NAME: emailuser
FIELD.COMMENT: Under what conditions should an email be sent

FIELD.NAME: emailcontent
FIELD.COMMENT: The html-formatted text that should be sent to the user

FIELD.NAME: emailcontentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the emailcontent field

FIELD.NAME: emailsubject
FIELD.COMMENT: Email subject line for emails going to user

FIELD.NAME: emailcontentmanager
FIELD.COMMENT: The html-formatted text that should be sent to the user's manager

FIELD.NAME: emailcontentmanagerformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the emailcontentmanager field

FIELD.NAME: emailsubjectmanager
FIELD.COMMENT: Email subject line for emails going to user's manager

FIELD.NAME: emailrecipient
FIELD.COMMENT: Who should receive any email - user|manager|both

FIELD.NAME: thirdpartyemails
FIELD.COMMENT: Addresses of third parties

FIELD.NAME: emailsubjectthirdparty
FIELD.COMMENT: Email subject line for emails going to third parties

FIELD.NAME: emailcontentthirdparty
FIELD.COMMENT: The html-formatted text that should be sent to the third party

FIELD.NAME: emailcontentthirdpartyformat
FIELD.COMMENT: Format of the emailcontentthirdparty field

FIELD.NAME: duration
FIELD.COMMENT: how long the reengagement is

FIELD.NAME: remindercount
FIELD.COMMENT: how many times to send the email

FIELD.NAME: suppresstarget
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of module that, if completed, should prevent an email being sent out.

FIELD.NAME: emaildelay
FIELD.COMMENT: Time setting related to email

FIELD.NAME: emailfrom
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of user to use as sender, 0 for support user, -1 for default teacher.

FIELD.NAME: instantmessage
FIELD.COMMENT: Notification type, 0 for email, 1 for instant message

TABLE.NAME: reengagement_inprogress
TABLE.COMMENT: records of reengagement activities currently in progress

FIELD.NAME: reengagement
FIELD.COMMENT: id of the reengagement which is in progress

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: id of user this record relates to.

FIELD.NAME: completiontime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix time when this module will be complete for this user.

FIELD.NAME: emailtime
FIELD.COMMENT: Unix time when user should be emailed (if set to emailaftertime)

FIELD.NAME: emailsent
FIELD.COMMENT: whether the user has been sent the email

FIELD.NAME: completed
FIELD.COMMENT: whether the user has been marked as completed
